description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nPop!:
After this creature takes damage from an attack or spell, each enemy has a 50% chance to be afflicted with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BOMB}. If they already have {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BOMB}, they take damage equal to 1% to 160% of their {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BOMB}'s potency.
name: Bouquet of Balloons
